122.content:
(Nah,) Vince thought, (I'm fine the way I am.)
He noticed, though, that his father began pressing him into eating seconds. At first, Vince refused, and it would make his father mad. To the point where he would not want to speak to Vince for the rest of the day, or night depending on the meal. But then, Dad was also slowly increasing Vince's portions, until Vince was eating double of what he was two months ago. So, without Vince really noticing, he was eating "seconds" without being asked.
It wasn't until Dad accidentally let slip a comment about Vince that he got suspicious. They were sitting at the table, having just finished a nice meal.
"Boy, you sure ate a bunch there, huh? Ha hah, Vince, my young MAN..."
Vince had smiled slightly and nodded, hiding his true confusion. He cleaned up his place and then headed to the bathroom where the scale was, and the mirror. He remembered how much he weighed: 130 pounds.

During the commercial break his Dad came in, holding up two dress shirts, one dark and the other light. "Which one do you think I should wear tonight?" he asked his son.

"What's the occasion?" Vince asked, surprised to see his dad dressing up, and more importantly making a big deal of it.

Vince groaned, suddenly remembering his Dad telling him about the dinner. "Can't I just stay behind and order take-out? It's going to be a bunch of adults and be sooo boring."

His dad frowned, "Well, I can't make you go, but you know Buddy, it would mean a lot to me if you did. You know I've been working towards that new promotion for months now, and having you with me tonight to do the whole 'happy modern family thing' would really help seal the deal." His dad smiled, trying to be persuasive. "And it won't be just a bunch of old farts like me, I know my boss has a kid about your age. Plus, I promise to let you have some booze if you try not to get drunk."

Vince felt guilty now. He knew how badly his dad wanted the new job -it was all he ever talked about. And the promise of getting to drink was appealing. "Go with the dark shirt. It won't show the stains if you accidentally spill something on it," he finally said, getting up to go change.

14.title: Alex

choices: Alex finds his clothes are too tight a fit
Alex fakes sick, as he doesn't want to go to the wedding
142.content:
Alex suddenly smelled something delicious from downstairs. Looking at his watch, he realized it was dinner time.

"Alex, dinner!" his Mom called from downstairs.

"Coming!" Alex called.

And he ran down stairs to the kitchen as fast as he could, as he had strong legs from playing sports so much.

His whole family was seated at the table: his mom, dad, and little sister.

"Sit down, boy!" Dad laughed.

Alex obeyed. He was feeling especially hungry. He looked at all of the food that was layed out and spooned huge helpings of everything onto his plate.

His family was not surprised, as Alex always ate a lot because he used up so much energy on the sporting fields.

By now, everyone was paying no mind to Alex. Dad was telling a story about his day at the office while Mom was trying to talk her daughter out of wanting some expensive toy.

No one was eating the food, and it would be horrible if it went to waste, so Alex helped himself to seconds with even bigger helpings of everything.

Soon, everyone was watching the TV in the other room, leaving Alex with the leftovers. Halfway through his fourth helping of chicken and mashed potatoes and vegetables, Alex felt too full to keep eating. But he shovelled in a few more bites anyway so not much food would be left.

Alex found himself burping and hiccuping. His fullness made him groan and he clutched his belly.

"I'm going upstairs," Alex announced. "Homework."

The family didn't pay much attention, as they were focused on watching TV.

"Okay, sweetie," Mom said dully.

When Alex got back up to his room, he didn't feel as bad. His belly was still full, but it didn't hurt at all.

He went to the bathroom and took off his shirt. He was surprised to see his tummy sticking out. It made him feel bigger and told him his weight problem must be progressing.

He stepped on the scale and was shocked. It said he weighed 144 pounds, four pounds more than what he weighed before he ate. That was four more pounds to the ten pounds he had already gained. He reckoned this rise in weight was because of all the food he was carrying in his tummy. When he digested it all that night, he would be back to where he was the next morning.

Suddenly, he remembered the Geography assignment. He put his shirt back on and hurried to his room. Once he got to thinking, he understand just how to complete it. He recognized all of the land forms and mountain ranges in the textbook and was able to research and answer questions about them with ease.

In no time at all, he had completed his work. All five pages of Geography questions were answered. And it had been only a half hour. It was only 9:00. He figured he was so focused because of all the food he ate. It actually made him feel good, and may have sparked his brain. It was a lot better than being hungry, anyway. And less tiring than playing sports.

Alex was feeling very good about himself. He imagined turning in his work early while his friends struggled to pass their classes. He went back to the bathroom to take a shower. When he emerged, he still found himself burping off his dinner. He poked out his belly of digesting food and looked at it in the mirror. He laughed at himself and found it funny he was letting himself go and that the stress was going with it. He dried himself off and got into his boxers and t-shirt.

By now, Alex had grown very tired. He had been laying in bed watching TV, when his mom poked her head into his room.

"Get some sleep, Alex," she said, "Chara's wedding is at noon tomorrow, and I don't want you oversleeping."

"I won't" Alex yawned.

"Good. I'm laying out your clothes for tomorrow on your desk."

"Okay," Alex yawned.

"Good night," Mom said.

"Good night," Alex said back. And he quickly passed out to sleep.

The Next Morning...

Alex grabbed his clothes and headed to the bathroom. He wet his hair and combed it down. Then he took off his t-shirt and grabbed his new shirt. He buttoned it up and found it was tight around his chest and stomach. It was nearly skin-tight and not loose at all. Alex hated the way it hugged him so tightly.

POP! The middle button flew right off of the shirt. Alex had puffed out his stomach a little too much for the shirt to handle. Alex gasped and moaned. The shirt was from ten pounds ago.

He quickly weighed himself and was a little surprised to see he was still two pounds heavier. He weighed 142 pounds, and his belly was completely empty. He had seriously put on a little bit of weight. But, he wasn't concerned. He was more focused on his shirt problem.

Alex figured he had new shirts somewhere that he could wear. He was now focused on his pants. He pulled them up and found that they were tight around his waist and butt. But would they button? No. Alex couldn't get the two flaps together no matter how hard he tried. He moaned and threw the pants aside. Then he put on his t-shirt and went downstairs. His mom could find him clothes.

Alex was now thinking about breakfast. He was feeling hungry. He got to the fridge in the kitchen and opened it.

14211.content:
Alex was now thinking about breakfast. He was feeling hungry. He got to the fridge in the kitchen and opened it. He peered around curiously when finally he spotted several bagels and some cream cheese.

He busied himself spreading liberal amounts on his first bagel and bit into it happily. He polished it off in no time at all and then started on a second. Before long he had wolfed down three bagels and was still feeling uncomfortably hungry. Rubbing his stomach absentmindedly, He went over to the pantry where he discovered some cookies and packaged cupcakes. He seized these hungrily and set to work devouring them.

He leaned back on the hind legs of his chair as he munched on a large creme filled cupcake, the chair creaking slightly as he did so. Alex belched slightly and munched away, on the cakes and cookies. A few moments later he reached into the box of cookies for yet another tasty snack, but his hand met nothing but the inside of the box. Alex frowned and looked inside only to find it was empty. Alex felt his stomach plummet and hurriedly looked over at the cupcake box. It too was empty.

Alex groaned. This was surely not going to help his wardrobe problem any. He looked down apprehensively at his belly and found that his fears had been confirmed. The waistband of his boxers has slipped beneath the widest part of his torso so that the front section of his waistband and a good inch or so of his lap was obscured by a large roll of soft, fleshy fat. His t-shirt was clinging tightly to every curve of his body, and was straining to cover all of his stomach. Several inches of it had already slipped free of the shirt’s clutches and was hanging out for the world to see.

Alex put a tentative hand on his stomach and patted it gently. It wiggled like jell-o beneath his fingers. He looked desperately around the kitchen at a loss for what do, wishing he could take back all the food he’d just eaten.

Just then, his mother entered the room, dressed in her pajamas. “Morning Alex.” She said sleepily, starting on a cup of coffee. “Why aren’t you dressed?”

Alex felt his cheeks glow red. “Well, um, those clothes you put out didn’t really fit, Mom.”
14211.title: Breakfast

142111.content:
Alex’s Mom looked around so fast she nearly dropped the coffee grounds she was holding. “What do you mean they don’t fit? They fit when we bought them two months ago.”

“Well––” Alex began. “They’re a little too tight.”

“Too tight?” His Mom repeated striding over to where Alex sat at the table, his belly seeping out of his clothes while empty sweets rappers littered the table around him. “Well that’s hardly surprising with all that you’ve been eating lately.”

“What do you mean?” Alex said still blushing red, even though he new full well what she meant.

“Alex look at yourself.” His mother barked. “You’ve let yourself go! Did you just eat all this?” She asked indicating the empty boxes.

“Well yeah.” Alex said sheepishly. “But I thought eating breakfast was good for you.”

“Not when your breakfast is a box of cookies and a dozen cupcakes!” His mother practically bellowed. “How can you be surprised your clothes don’t fit when you eat like that?!”

Alex shrugged and his mother continued her rant. “Look at this Alex.” She said jabbing her finger into his round belly. “This is too much. You’re going on a diet young man.”

“A d-diet.” Alex choked. “But Mom it’s only a couple of pounds.”

“A couple of pounds my eye!” His Mom said. “You go put on those clothes Alex, I don’t care how tight they are, you are wearing them to your cousin’s wedding do you understand me?”

“But Mom, they don’t fit!” Alex insisted.

“And whose fault is that?” His mother demanded.

“Well.” Alex said. “One of the buttons popped off the shirt.”

His mom sighed. “Bring it to me.” She said. “I’ll sew it back on.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Twenty minutes later Alex was looking at himself self-consciously in the mirror. At his mothers behest he had squeezed himself into his too small clothes. His shirt was straining to contain his girth and his pants were painfully tight in the waist and buttocks. He literally had to suck in his stomach to keep all the buttons from bursting on his shirt. He had also put on a jacket and tie that detracted slightly from his midriff. As long as he didn’t eat anything at the wedding everything should be fine. Maybe.

"No, I had a big breakfast."
"I can tell," she said. Ollie looked at her carefully. She sounded... something. Like there was some underlying meaning to her words.
"I think I gained a few pounds from that, yesterday?" Ollie grinned.
"How much?"
"Maybe just like... I dunno, two?"
"Oh," Jenny said, but it almost sounded like "Aww, too bad."
After school, Ollie had made plans to...

Ollie sat up in bed, yawning. "Huh?" He placed a hand on his belly, which was softer and bigger. "What's happening to me?" He stood up.

Ollie stuffed item after item into his mouth, not caring that his beater was getting stained up, just wanting food by the mouthful. He ate the sandwiches, the leftover ribs from Tuesday night, the last piece of apple pie, the bottle of chocolate syrup, and on and on until, to his dismay, there was nothing edible left inside the fridge. Empty bottles and packages, wrappers, so much trash lay around him as he lay on the cold kitchen floor, rubbing his hyper-distended stomach and moaning contentedly.
It felt wonderful to have so much inside him... to know he could fit that much... Ollie sat up, wiping some syrup off his face. He stood slowly, feeling like he'd gained fifty pounds. Ollie proceeded to pick up all the trash he'd left behind, and as he threw it away, he wondered what he'd tell his parents. They'd be mad, wanting to know why he'd emptied the fridge, and then the perfect story came to him: "I got up and wanted something to eat, and I ate a few different things, so yeah, it's kinda my fault... but then I looked and a bunch of the food was past expiration date! Some of it had maggots on it and some had mold and there was this one sandwich that had turned YELLOW."

Luckily, there was no noise or indication that Ollie had to worry about his parents just yet, and for some odd reason, he was still hungry! The fridge was empty, but he just needed more. Thus, he began to check the cabinets - bingo! Crackers were crammed into his mouth, followed by cans of soup, which he didn't bother to heat up. He did bother to heat the rice, though, and a brand new package was stuffed into his swollen midsection. Cookies, other delights... Ollie couldn't help himself! He just ate and ate, until he opened the last cabinet and found nothing. It was bare.

Ollie groaned as he moved back, feeling more stuffed than he ever had in his life. His hands went to his stomach, which hurt, and... holy crap! His gut was huge, almost the size of a basket-ball! It felt hard to his touch, no longer giggling. In fact, as he tried to pinch at the skin, he found little to no give. "Enough for now..." but his stomach growled.

"Oh come on!" How could he POSSIBLY still be hungry?!
151221.title: Too stuffed....

(too skinny). Her words echoed in Ollie's head. (too skinny).
Well, maybe it wouldn't be that hard to put on some weight, and maybe Jenny would like that!
Ollie went home, and the first thing he did was...

Ollie's happy with the extra weight and wants to go see Jenny.

Ollie could hear the opening riff to "Eye Of The Tiger" as he flung open the cabinets, then the fridge, and piled food on a blanket, then carried it upstairs and started eating. (too skinny) He ate and ate, sometimes opening a full pack of something or a box of something else and just inhaling it. Ollie finished all his food, then fingered his bulging gut, which stuck out of his shirt. Satisfied for now, he went to sleep.
The next night, he did more of the same.
And the night after that...
By the weekend, Ollie weighed himself. He was tall for thirteen, about 5'10", and had weighed 145 pounds on Monday.

Ollie was delighted when his pizza arrived, and he wasted no time in sitting down with a movie, a large Mountain Dew and his Stuffed Crust. His skin was stretched tight and his stomach was protesting halfway through, but by the time the movie was over, he was drinking the last bit of Dew and taking the last bite of pizza. His gut was enormous. Ollie couldn't ever remember having been that bloated.
(too skinny)
Ollie woke up the next morning, and the first thing he noticed was that his belly wasn't bloated anymore-- he was empty-- but he still LOOKED bloated.

Ollie smiled as he realized that he'd gained some weight. Jenny would be so pleased! His belly was round and a little jiggly, not really flabby, but plump.

"Oh. My. Gosh." Jenny looked at him. "Oliver..." He loved the way she said his name. "You are perfect." Jenny stroked his neck, in a straight line all the way down his chest and ending at his navel. "That is so sweet that you'd change your body for me!"
"Um..." Ollie grinned at her sheepishly. "Whatever looks best on me, I guess..." He laughed, nervous, and Jenny hugged him.

Jenny goes home and Ollie goes to bed happy.

(too skinny)
"Hi Jenny," Ollie waved, grinning shyly.
"Oh, morning Ollie!" Jenny said. She seemed so normal, and yet, she had this thing for bellies, this fetish-- Ollie just had the word "fetish" in his spelling list for school, so he knew it well. She seemed happy to see him, though.
"Hey, uh... you wanna come over tonight and hang out? Maybe get some homework done?"
"Oh, sure!" Jenny grinned, making Ollie go red. He suddenly realized how tall he was compared to her, how soft she would be if he held her in his arms...
Ollie placed a hand over his stomach. It wasn't as firm as it used to be. Softer, kinda squishy... He was still too tall for it to be really noticeable.
Jenny showed up at his house that evening, carrying her bookbag. They got their homework done quickly, helping each other as needed. Ollie's mom popped them a big bowl of popcorn, and they watched a movie together. It wasn't long before the entire bowl was empty, 90% of it making a glorious journey into Ollie's expanding stomach. He burped, and Jenny shifted a little, stealing a glance at him. She inhaled sharply, not loud enough for anyone to hear-- except for Ollie, who slowly inclined his head to look at her.
"Jenny..."
"How much?"
"Uh..."
"Come on, tell me! I know you know what I'm talking about," she said, a little impatiently but yet, so subtly seductive...
"I don't know," Ollie admitted, lifting his shirt. "Maybe five or six?" He rubbed the gut, and then Jenny's hand was on his stomach, then both of them, and she made him stand so she could rub his from behind. Ollie almost fell back, his legs feeling like putty. It felt so GOOD, and it was JENNY...
"Oh," she moaned, and he could feel her heavy exhalation on his back. "Ollie, make it bigger..."
"What?"
"*Please* make it bigger!" Jenny begged, giving him a little squeeze, which made his eyes open wide with surprise and pleasure.
"Uh... ok," Ollie shrugged, turning around. Jenny allowed that, but continued to rub his bulging belly.
"I can almost FEEL it," she whispered, grinning evilly.
"Feel what?"
"All that popcorn."
Ollie laughed his head off. "Wow, Jenny." He stood there, basking in her massaging, until she suddenly stopped.
"Aww, why'd you stop?" he whined.
"I wanna make it bigger," she said, lust dripping from her tone. She pulled him into the kitchen, where she found a spray-can of whipped topping. "Perfect," she grinned. They went back into the living room and she had him lay back on the couch. She positioned herself above him, so she could push the nozzle and feel his belly at the same time.
"OH," she moaned again, feeling his belly swell up as she shot him full of whipped cream. When she threw the can away, Ollie's belly bulged upwards like a beach ball, smooth and warm and tighter than an innertube. He could barely speak.
15222.title: Jenny wants more.

He realized that it'd been a few days since he'd exercised at all... Ollie pushed up off his bed, but then sank back down. (I'll exercise tomorrow), he thought.
(too skinny)
"Good GRIEF," Ollie said in awe. It was early the next morning, and he was hungry. So right off the bat, he knew that his belly wasn't bulging out of his shirt because he was full of food. When he raised his arms up, his shirt traveled up, up, up, until you could just see the bottom of his navel. He shook his belly up and down. He SHOOK it. It jiggled like Jell-O.
Ollie decides:

"Mmm," Ollie moaned with satisfaction, rubbing his gut. "What's for desert?"
"Desert?!?!" Rob freaked. "You ate ten burgers! You still have room?"
"I must be growing," Ollie shrugged, smiling hazily.
"You're insane," Jeremy said later as they were walking out. Ollie grinned, wiping the ice cream off his mouth. "I've never seen anything like you!"
"Dude... that's not normal," Rob said, poking Ollie in the gut. "Are you an alien?"
Ollie laughed. Jenny looked rather thoughtful. "I think he looks kinda cute with a little belly," she said.
The three boys stopped and looked at her.
"Pardon me?" Ollie said, his eyes wide.
"Yeah, you look cute! It's all round and warm..."

Ollie decides to keep gaining until 200 pounds.
1531.content:
"Wow, Jen," Jeremy chuckled. Rob was laughing his head off. Ollie was more embarrassed than anything else, but he laughed quietly, too. Jenny went red.
"Well, it's true!"
"Ok, Jen."
Ollie looked at Jenny, who seemed hurt. "Hey, Jen, why don't you come with me to that one party later this week?"
"Huh?"
"Yeah, at Dustin's house. He always throws good parties."
"Oh, ok."
Ollie waited impatiently all week for the party at Dustin's. He walked by Jenny's house the night of the party to walk her there. She came out dressed casually, as usual. Ollie had worn one of his button-up shirts over a t-shirt.
"You look so cute," Jenny told him. He went red. "Did you lose that burger weight?"
"Actually, no," Ollie admitted, grinning. He pulled up his shirt. Jenny stared, longingly. "See?" His belly was a bit rounded as opposed to its original flatness.
Jenny smiled, mischievous. "You should show everyone at the party how much you can fit in there."
"Really?"
"Yeah!"
At the party, there was a lot of yummy food. Ollie was conservative about it, not wanting to stuff himself. Jenny encouraged him, though. Especially when she "entered" him into a challenge without his consent. "Hey guys, Ollie's gonna eat all this if you don't get some now!"
"No I'm not," Ollie frowned.
"Aww, come on," Jenny whined.
"I can't eat EVERYTHING..."
"But you're the bottomless pit!"
"No, I--"
"Yeah, OL-LIE, OL-LIE," she got everyone chanting.
Embarrassed to be put on the spot, Ollie agreed to eat four whole apple pies. He was fine during the first pie, but towards the end of it he was starting to grow. By the third pie, his shirt was stretched over his gut, and when he finished the fourth, he took a deep breath and his button-up shirt popped open. Everyone was cheering and laughing with him about it.
Ollie stepped on the scale the next morning and it said he weighed 170. "Whoa!" he recoiled, shocked. "How the heck..."
He looked at himself in the mirror. His belly wasn't just small anymore, it was bigger, and when he touched it, it was soft and fat and felt kind of fun to play with.
A week later, after doing nothing but eating, going to school, and sitting around playing video games, Ollie's weight was up to 183. Thirteen pounds in one week! Now, when he raised his arms, his t-shirt came up and showed off his bellybutton, and he could eat an entire pizza easily.

154.content:
"Oh, c'mon Ollie, you can do it!" Jenny said, patting his distended stomach gently.
"Jenny," he moaned, and she took her hand away quickly. She looked at his plate.
"Here, I'll help you," she said, picking up the last part of his final burger. "You don't even have to lift a finger!"
Ollie looked at her, and something in her eyes startled him a little, but he dismissed it quickly and opened his mouth, allowing her to feed him.
"I can't decide if this is really sweet, or really gross," Jeremy muttered, watching Jenny push the burger into Ollie's open mouth. He chewed and swallowed, then lifted his shirt. His belly was bulging over his jeans, and Rob made a snide-but-teasing comment about him being pregnant.
Ollie walked home feeling bloated and happy, but also a little confused... Jenny looked so intense about feeding him... He watched her as they walked, curious. Then, he was at his house, and he said good-bye to his friends.
Ollie headed to his bedroom, rubbing his stomach and moaning. He lifted his t-shirt again, seeing how bloated he was. (it'll be gone by tomorrow,) he thought. (and I'll be puttin' on muscle when I get older, so it can't hurt to have a little extra weight right now...)
Ollie went to bed happy. When he woke up, he felt someone rubbing his belly. He groaned in pleasure, but then, he wasn't fully awake.
His eyes opened wide when he realized that it was a girl standing there, in his bedroom, in the middle of the night.
"Hi, Ollie," she said in a low, seductive voice.
"Jenny?"
"Oh, yeah..." She laid over him, still rubbing his belly so soothingly... that's when he realized what else was wrong with the picture: he was still bloated as ever... (well, what did you expect, you ate ten burgers!) he thought afte a few minutes.
"Do you like this?" Jenny asked.
"I..." Ollie closed his eyes, "Yeah, I do..."

He woke up the next morning, and the first thought that crossed his mind was (I wonder how much weight I put on from those burgers). He felt his stomach, which was a little softer. He checked himself out in the mirror. His profile was a little thicker, not much, barely noticeable...
Jenny waved at him during class, a little girly-giggly wave. Ollie'd never seen her act like this.

Jenny sat with her legs on either side of him, and he wondered if maybe he was dreaming, but then she was feeding him the most amazing brownies he'd ever tasted, and they filled him up so nicely...

And he still wondered what special meant!

Ollie's eyes blinked open, and he couldn't see anything because it was so pitch black in his room. He reached over and flicked on the lamp, wondering why he'd woken up. (maybe I gotta go pee?) he wondered. Ollie stood up, and part of him noticed that he felt strange, like, heavier. He headed to the bathroom, flicking the lightswitch up.

Now, he raised his arms, and his shirt went up, revealing his bellybutton. He felt his stomach, how soft it had gotten, how his skin formed around his splayed fingers when he pressed a little...
